issue.title: Enhance TimeStampArray to support IANA/Olson TZ strings
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9515](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9515). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
# Summary

The format of a Timestamp may include an IANA/Olson timezone identifier, but this is not currently supported by the C# implementation in `TimestampArray`.

From the schema:

```

The time zone is a string indicating the name of a time zone, one of:

 * As used in the Olson time zone database (the "tz database" or
   "tzdata"), such as "America/New_York"
 * An absolute time zone offset of the form +XX:XX or -XX:XX, such as +07:30
```

# Acceptance Criteria

- `TimestampArray` _must_ support IANA/Olson timezone identifiers.
